about.subtitle: About us
about.title: Discover a new way to care for your skin
about.description1: Specialized in dermatology and aesthetic medicine, with a focus on treatments that promote health, self-esteem, and natural beauty. With training in Dermatology, Aesthetic Medicine, Trichology, and Scientific Cosmetics, Dr. Leonardo offers an individualized approach, integrating science, aesthetics, and attentive care. His protocols include facial rejuvenation, hair health, and modern techniques to highlight each patient’s natural beauty.
about.description2: Committed to ethics and constant professional development, Dr. Leonardo provides safe, effective care tailored to each individual’s needs.

doctor.subtitle: Who I am
doctor.description1: I'm Dr. Leonardo Martinelli, a physician passionate about science, caring for people, and the impact self-esteem has on each person’s life. I graduated from UFPR and specialized in Dermatology, Aesthetic Medicine, Trichology, and Scientific Cosmetics. From the beginning, I’ve always believed that my role in medicine goes beyond treatment — it’s about listening, supporting, and helping each patient feel good about their own image.
doctor.description2: For me, aesthetics doesn’t change who you are. It reveals your best, with lightness, naturalness, and respect for your essence.
